Posts.Content: mebe wrote: Hello all I am new here happy to have found this forum.I have been a wreck ,went for my yearly mammo and got called back for first time ever I am 53 been having mammo's since age 40 anyway they did the diagnostic views second time and an then an ultra sound, when I left there I thought that I was just gonna have to have a repeat mammo in 6mos but surprise,got call from gynecologist office to see surgeon for yet another opinion, I was BIRADS 3, ultra sound report says probable 6mm complex cyst versus lymph node...has anyone had a cyst that size biopsied??? I was wondering if it might be too small..anyway I go tomorrow and this whole thing has freaked me out,scared silly and hoping for the best for the rest of you on this forum too.. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: surgeon tomorrow mebe mebe

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2007 12:44PM mebe wrote: Well Nina I have to agree waiting the worst I tried to keep real busy before I went to keep my mind off it but its hard wondering whats gonna happen to you,I do hope all goes well for you and you will comeback and let us know too....I went to my surgeon appt. yesterday shaking all the way and got there and she did another breast exam and then proceeded to do the ultra sound to find the cyst that showed up on the previous ultra sound well she kept searching and going over my right breast and it was gone!!!!! I couldn't believe it I didn't know whether to be relieved or more concerned ,all that stress...anyway we decided another ultra sound in Sept.to be sure,I was comfortable with that..
Posts.Title: surgeon tomorrow mebe mebe
